endpoints.name: profile_memory
endpoints.description: Write a memory profile to the specified file

messages.name: ProfileMemoryRequestMsg
messages.description: A message describing where to write the memory profile

fields.name: path
fields.description: Path of the file where the memory profile will be written

messages.name: ProfileMemoryResponseMsg
messages.description: A message describing the result of a memory profile

fields.name: succeeded
fields.description: Whether the memory profile was written successfully

fields.name: error
fields.description: The reason why the memory profile failed

messages.name: QuitResultMsg
messages.description: A message describing the result of a quit request.

fields.name: accepted
fields.description: Whether the quit request was accepted.

fields.name: reject_reason
fields.description: The reason the quit request was rejected.
